name: Show of game
description:
Hello, Daniel here.

Like every game developer, I got lot of unfinished project so I decided to chalange myself to create some small game in one week. It taken me about 2 weeks, (Yeah, I failed the chalange) but here is my finished game. 

It is action platformer where you play as knight fighting (mostly) a wolfs. Your goal is to get to end of the level and that is all. 

Controls:

WASD / Arrow key : Movement
Space: Jump
Left shift: Roll
Left mouse click: Attack
